title: House Prediction Model
description: This project enhanced my expertise in regression techniques, including Linear Regression and Random Forest. The trained model is deployed via a Flask backend with a React frontend, enabling users to predict housing prices in California using serialized .pkl models for efficient inference.
keyFeatures: Regression model using Random Forest and Linear Regression
Full-stack deployment with React frontend and Flask backend

title: ThreadSight
description: ThreadSight is a deep learning tool that classifies apparel images into 15 fashion categories using a convolutional neural network. It uses Grad-CAM visualizations to show how the model interprets image features, enhancing transparency in AI decision-making. This tool combines OpenCV, Matplotlib, and other Python libraries to deliver interpretable and accurate fashion classification
keyFeatures: CNN-based image classification for 15 fashion categories

title: TaskMasterAI
description: Built as part of the AI Society's Mentorship Program, TaskMasterAI is an AI-driven student workflow platform that generates personalized study plans and dynamic quizzes tailored to each user's needs. It also features a friend match making algrothim to help students find other students with similar interests and goals. The platform uses a RAG model to analyze user data and utilizes the Gemini API for natural language processing, providing an all in one academic productivity tool to students for free.
keyFeatures: Dynamic quiz creation with adaptive learning

title: Arkos (HackAI 2025)
description: Arkos leverages a RAG model to analyze financial reports, allowing users to query key metrics such as revenue and profit margins using natural language. The backend, developed with Flask and Python, integrates the Gemini API and Chroma DB for efficient document retrieval, making complex financial data easily accessible through conversational queries.
keyFeatures: Natural language querying for financial metrics

title: Bank Siumulator
description: Bank Simulator is a full-stack app with React and MongoDB featuring JWT-based authentication and secure routing. It integrates Gemini API for AI features, Google Cloud hosting, and OCR for enhanced data processing.
keyFeatures: AI-powered features with OCR document processing

title: Insurance Prediction (FinHack 2025)
description: Developed for FinHack 2025, this project predicts health insurance costs using a TensorFlow-powered linear regression model served through a Flask API. The React frontend provides a user-friendly interface, enabling predictions based on individual health data and regional factors for personalized insurance pricing.
keyFeatures: TensorFlow linear regression for insurance cost prediction
React frontend with Flask API integration

title: SignLangAI (HackUTD 2024)
description: SignLangAI is a real-time sign language recognition app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Utilizing TensorFlow.js and MobileNet, it processes webcam input directly in the browser, enabling accessible and instant translation of sign language gestures without the need for external software or hardware.
keyFeatures: Real-time sign language recognition via webcam
In-browser deep learning with TensorFlow.js and MobileNet

title: Figma Designs
description: Collection of all the prototype designs I've made on figma
